00024 void Player::MoveForward(float time)
00025 {
00026         m_currentMoveSpeed = m_moveSpeed * time * 15;
00027         float dx = m_currentMoveSpeed * glm::sin(m_playerModel->GetRotation().y);
00028         float dz = m_currentMoveSpeed * glm::cos(m_playerModel->GetRotation().y);
00029 
00030         glm::vec3 temp = m_playerModel->GetPosition() + glm::vec3(dx, 0, dz);
00031         m_playerModel->SetPosition(temp);
00032 }
00033 
00034 void Player::MoveBackward(float time)
00035 {
00036         m_currentMoveSpeed = -m_moveSpeed * time * 15;
00037         float dx = m_currentMoveSpeed * glm::sin(m_playerModel->GetRotation().y);
00038         float dz = m_currentMoveSpeed * glm::cos(m_playerModel->GetRotation().y);
00039 
00040         glm::vec3 temp = m_playerModel->GetPosition() + glm::vec3(dx, 0, dz);
00041         m_playerModel->SetPosition(temp);
00042 }
00043 
00044 void Player::TurnClock(float time)
00045 {
00046         m_currentTurnSpeed = -m_turnSpeed * time * 10;
00047         m_playerModel->SetRotation(glm::vec3(0, m_playerModel->GetRotation().y + m_currentTurnSpeed, 0));
00048 }
00049 
00050 void Player::TurnAntiClock(float time)
00051 {
00052         m_currentTurnSpeed = m_turnSpeed * time * 10;
00053         m_playerModel->SetRotation(glm::vec3(0, m_playerModel->GetRotation().y + m_currentTurnSpeed, 0));
00054 }
